long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your webpages as bookmarks with custom names.
Designed for students for ease of access to their classroom webpages and subpages.
-- Features -- 
 * UI designed using Bootstrap
 * Easy to use edit feature
 * Saves all your webpages in local storage
-- Instructions --
 * Top right edit button allows you to:
    --> Create new courses 
    --> Delete existing courses
    --> Create new links for created courses
    --> Delete links for existing courses
 * Top left trash can button will delete all existing courses and links saved
-- Code --
This project is open-source can be found in the Website link below.
